dct_description_sm: At page top, above map: DE L'AMERIQUE. [page]171 [,] FIGURE CXVII.. Text on verso, page 272, entitled "Chapitre III. Du Canada ou nouvelle France. De la Ville de Quebec. De l'Estat du Canada. Du Pais des Hurons. Barania R is labeled in Mexico. Issued in his: Description de l'univers, Tome V, Paris, 1683

At page top, above map: das Mitternächtige America. Fig: 8. Barania R is unlabeled. With French title inside border and German title outside border. Issued in his German edition: Beschreibung des ganzen Welt-Kreisses ..., V, Franckfurt, 1684. Also issued in his: Beschreibung des gantzen weltkreises …, J. A. Jung…Frankfurt am Mayn 1719.
LC 3447, 4280; BN Manesson-Mallet I A(624) & I B; Faupel's Americana 90/81 & 91/54.
California shown to 40 deg. N. and labelled I. Californie.
